data.message:
Dear Mr. I'm-Too-Good-to-Comment-back-to-My-Fans
This'll be the last comment I ever send your ass
It's been six minutes and still no word, I don't deserve it?
I know you got my last two comments, my wi-fi connection here was perfect
So this is my last comment I'm sending you, I hope you read it
I'm in the car right now, I'm doing 90 on the freeway
Hey Slim, I drank a fifth of vodka, you dare me to drive
You know the song by Phil Collins "In the Air of the Night"
About that guy who coulda saved that other guy from drowning
But didn't, then Phil saw it all, then at a a show he found him
That's kinda how this is, you coulda rescued me from drowning
Now it's too late, I'm on a thousand downers now, I'm drowsy
And all I wanted was a lousy comment from Slim Shady
I hope you know I'm drunk yeah brain dead like jim brady
I loved you Slim, we coulda chat together, think about it
You ruined it now, I hope you can't sleep and you dream about it
And when you dream, I hope you can't sleep and you scream about it
I hope your conscience eats at you and you can't breathe without me
See Slim, fuck this bitch keeps interupting my typing
Hey Slim thats my girlfriend screaming while im driving
But I didn't slit her throat, I just tied her up, see, I ain't like you
Cause if she suffocates she'll suffer more and then she'll die too
Well, gotta go, I'm almost at the bridge now
Now see, unlike stan, i sended my shit out

replies.message: This laugh hella hard just now. Shit matter of fact i think Eminem should respond. lol
you're in the car doing 90 on the freeway and commenting on fb!?!? be careful!!!
does anyone know that stan is canibus? a rapper, who, by the way, is a lot better than eminem.
first off no1 is better then mearshall mathers aka eminem slim shady vaughan n 2 this lame ass stan shit is cray
Are you for real,get some new musix lyrics,  stop being somebody that already exist dude really
This guy gets paid alot ,you think he will give a respond, what wold are you living in, I wish he would respond who wouldn't
